title: Jenna Dewan is the epitome of fall chic as she puts her growing baby bump during quick lunch outing
text:
She's been a busy woman since announcing the pregnancy of her second child a couple weeks ago.

And on Tuesday, it was Jenna Dewan kept active as she stepped out for some lunch in Sherman Oaks.

The 38-year-old actress looked laid-back as she hopped out of her white Tesla and into the LA sunshine.

Heading out: Jenna Dewan stepped out for some lunch on Tuesday afternoon wearing a blue dress and a denim jacket

For the outing, the mother-of-one to her daughter Everly stepped out in a blue floral dress with a denim jacket.

She wore a pair of tan wedged heels and hid behind a small pair of sunglasses as she headed about her afternoon.

In addition to her blossoming pregnancy, Jenna has been busy promoting her new book.

The tome, titled Gracefully You, was written by the Step Up actress all about how she balances life, stress, and finding her 'true voice.'

Afternoon attire: She wore a pair of tan wedged heels and hid behind a small pair of sunglasses as she headed about her afternoon as she has been busy promoting her new book

'It started as a poetry book,' she said during an interview with People.

'It became a little bit of a lifestyle book, with some tips about things that I've learned in life, so then it turned into some memoir and some personal stories. I wanted to write about the things that are important to me. The spiritual side of myself, this presence that I love to connect with, it's really and truly my very hippy self.'

She says that she will even touch base on the downfall of her nine-year marriage to her now ex-husband Channing Tatum.

Busy day: She's been busy promoting her new book Gracefully You but seemed to make some time for a bite to eat

Jenna and Channing filed for divorce back in 2018 and shortly after she began dating her new boyfriend, Steve Kazee.

The two evidently hit it off and are now expecting their first child together after announcing the exciting news back in September.

In another interview with the magazine, she called meeting her new beau an 'instant connection'

'I saw him perform in Once on Broadway and I was just totally blown away by his talent. My mom was with me, and we got to go backstage and meet the actors. He just had a cool [energy] about him.'

Happy couple: Jenna and Steve Kazee pose behind the scenes of the People shoot
description:
She's been a busy woman since announcing the pregnancy of her second child a couple weeks ago.
On Tuesday, it was no different for Jenna Dewan as she stepped out for some lunch.
